entry.title: Pocketframe/docs: Pocketframe is a lightweight yet powerful PHP framework designed to simplify modern web application development. entry.title: rax-2/PassManager_preact: A simple password manager web application built with Preact for practicing component-based development. It allows users to add, edit, and delete stored passwords. This project demonstrates CRUD operations, state management, and lightweight UI design using Preact.
entry.content: A simple password manager web application built with Preact for practicing component-based development. It allows users to add, edit, and delete stored passwords. This project demonstrates CRUD operations, state management, and lightweight UI design using Preact.

entry.title: henrygad/makzontexteditor: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.
entry.content: Makzontexteditor is a modern, customizable, and lightweight rich text editor built with **React**, **TypeScript**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **Vite**. It offers intuitive formatting options, media embedding, and full control over your content creation workflow — perfect for blogs, CMS, note apps, and publishing platforms.
